comments.body: I believe, it changes the colour of the circle in the ZeroHello-Feed, and also adds a prefix, if I'm not mistaken.

I believe you can could use either:
```
page.cmd("wrapperPushState", [{ // Some stuff that get's passed to the state
},
    "Zite title",
    "#hash"
])
```
```
page.cmd("wrapperReplaceState", [{ // Some stuff that get's passed to the state
},
    "Zite title",
    "#hash"
])
```
Here's a link to the section on ZeroNet's Docs: zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/site_development/zeroframe_api_reference/#wrapperreplacestate-state-title-url and a link to the ZeroNet Docs on ZeroNet: http://127.0.0.1:43110/17Kom2G5qNDc6NaQwv445h1gFzxkY3ZtZe/site_development/zeroframe_api_reference/
